Html: Just an idea, but what about an assigned DPS value that pops up on the gear's mouseover tooltip?Â  Thatd save alot of time, and allow for regearing on the fly, before we have a chance to use Rawr and theorycraft.

You can use "Pawn" instead an make Rawr giving you the Weight Values for your current Equip.
